Function Documentation

void ISABCallOnce (  void(*)()  func,
ISABOnceFlag &  flag
) 
 

Used to call a function once in a thread safe manner.

This is useful especially for thread safe initialization, see boost::call_once or man pthread_once for rationale.

Implement with boost or whatever thread library we choose to use after JTC, currently implemented with pthread.
